column4: + MonkeyDust, right. I can login using "startx" just fine, but I have to open a console and type it manually (and it opens on F8). However, whenever I boot an Xubuntu load screen appears, never reaches the login prompt though (F7). Any more questions?
cat /etc/X11/default-display-manager
lightdm
and you are not using lightdm?
I am not sure if I am or should be.
I might add that I tried a number of different environments but ended up trying to remove all but MATE
xubuntu uses xfce. Ubuntu uses unity/lightdm vjacob
hmmm you seem to have a point there... I take it :)
You will want to find the mate equiv of what is actually in the file I asked you to cat.
I did install XFCE, I removed Unity and I am trying to run mate.
and change it using sudo/gksudo depending on your editor vjacob
(I also removed XFCE and other environments except MATE to the best of my knowledge)
ok
I wonder how to find out what that is called
it is probably in the same place as lightdm. ls /usr/bin/mat*
ahh
mate-session or mate-wm?
I dunno vjacob. I don't use mate
I would login, and call each and see what they do.
you, sir, brillian]
unlike me who type ] instead of !
Glad you got going vjacob :)
thank you for saving me from the torment that is Dr Who...
cheers for now]
